
Two friends reused a prime when generating RSA keys. They encrypted a message for you: ciphertext1: 5051217585805986468587867853069180902656257316438354411476679148605243065095010208567550857816913157299452244642508247882457234652845080819286737268844108, ciphertext2: 1795455881807850020563651639483775299631534100027920795683873087022320485127226039723710751642800092013735446171510763947631724739640669883500274928643692. Can you recover it by exploiting the shared factor?


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5202764674764274675842134850677053703305701233183524593475802598995223843941166458398810314230586843734471897450061840566571230208083381392384163041527517, n2=5917875892156505061070769772347358094869682511190253688886050441848422586046690217063804585448089776583561763347729278222457600639911415095315901555655313, e=708331545227134921748568995006336226044206905500530361728348958467654914454655380670915590920054157066714085466702188336724760916873535673248031754872897

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{grmn6tyk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5051217585805986468587867853069180902656257316438354411476679148605243065095010208567550857816913157299452244642508247882457234652845080819286737268844108, ciphertext2: 1795455881807850020563651639483775299631534100027920795683873087022320485127226039723710751642800092013735446171510763947631724739640669883500274928643692
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5202764674764274675842134850677053703305701233183524593475802598995223843941166458398810314230586843734471897450061840566571230208083381392384163041527517, n2=5917875892156505061070769772347358094869682511190253688886050441848422586046690217063804585448089776583561763347729278222457600639911415095315901555655313, e=708331545227134921748568995006336226044206905500530361728348958467654914454655380670915590920054157066714085466702188336724760916873535673248031754872897
extra_info: p=68594595039014447846911595305448936389410237985722295994216312719300063416881, q=75848026682060092264758502504822040810464807614079920811861121620921191221357, r=78022806275014495622852521381298702173274419989265856027842268422035018208309, φ(n1)=5202764674764274675842134850677053703305701233183524593475802598995223843941022015777089239690475173636661626472861965520971427991277303958043941786889280, φ(n2)=5917875892156505061070769772347358094869682511190253688886050441848422586046536346230847510860202165559675642604745538994854254863071711705272945346225648
